mapper.select: select dr.dosing_record_id, dr.dosing_amount, dr.medicine_id, dr.dosing_person, dr.record_person, dr.batch_id, dr.record_time, dr.gmt_create, dr.gmt_modified, bi.batch_name, mi.medicine_name, ubi.name as record_person_name, ubi2.name as dosing_person_name from dosing_record dr join batch_info bi on dr.batch_id = bi.batch_id join medicine_info mi on dr.medicine_id = mi.medicine_id join user_basic_info ubi on dr.record_person = ubi.user_basic_info_id join user_basic_info ubi2 on dr.dosing_person = ubi2.user_basic_info_id;
